descriptionNullable:
Thermal Object Detection for Autonomous Vehicles
This dataset provides real-world thermal imagery for training and evaluating object detection algorithms in autonomous vehicles. It  focuses on identifying moving objects crucial for self-driving cars, including:

Cars
Bicycles
People
Dogs
Data Summary:

Size: Over 12,000 thermal images
Focus: Primarily annotated for cars
Applications:
Training object detection models for autonomous vehicles
Research on thermal image analysis for self-driving applications
If you're working on self-driving car perception systems, this dataset can be valuable for:

Developing and refining thermal object detection algorithms
Evaluating the performance of object detection models in low-light or adverse weather conditions
title: FLIR 2024 Dataset Yolov8 Version
